alert.note: Alert for South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN CASS COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Staples Airport, or 29 miles west of Brainerd, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pillager around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sylvan, Esterdy, Casino, Crow Wing State Park and East Gull Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
